channel.title: Oxford on Math Life
channel.description: Recent content in Oxford on Math Life

item.title: Oxford
item.description: I was back in Oxford to give a talk at the workshop on The P=W Conjecture in Non Abelian Hodge Theory, part of the Clay Mathematical Institute conference of 2024. I arrived a day early, on Saturday, and spent the day walking around town remembering the old days (2009-2010 when I visited for the year). There was some kind of graduation ceremony happening and though I don’t really like to take pictures of people I could not resist this one.
